title: Vijay’s 'Jana Nayagan' Faces Flak For AI Use In Trailer: 5 Films Caught In AI Controversies
description: The use of artificial intelligence in movies continues to be a subject of intense debate. Just weeks after Disney CEO Bob Iger faced backlash after announcing AI-generated content would be allowed on Disney+, Thalapathy Vijay-starrer 'Jana Nayagan' has left fans split over AI use in its trailer.

title: CEO of AI Startup Says Artificial Data Won't Take Over for Decades
description: Artificial intelligence won't be training AI anytime soon, says Invisible Technologies CEO.
content:
Artificial intelligence won't be training AI anytime soon, says the CEO of a data labeling startup.

title: Banks, e-commerce platforms ramp up safeguards as online scams evolve
description: Industry players say better checks are needed as scammers increasingly use artificial intelligence to mimic legitimate transactions.
content: SINGAPORE: From tighter identity checks and real-time payment alerts to in-app advisories and transaction nudges, banks and e-commerce platforms in Singapore say they have strengthened targeted anti-scam measures, as fraud tactics grow more sophistic... [6055 chars]

title: AI Godfather Yoshua Bengio warns against giving rights to AI, says humans could lose control
description: AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio has cautioned against granting rights to artificial intelligence, warning that doing so could leave humans without the ability to control or shut down advanced AI systems.
content: AI Godfather Yoshua Bengio has just sounded an alarm to people against giving Artificial Intelligence rights. In an interview with The Guardian Yoshua Bengio hinted that giving rights to AI will be similar to “giving citizenship to extra terrestials”... [2054 chars]

title: Lamborghini says AI is inevitable in car manufacturing - even for low-volume supercars
description: The Italian exotic automaker says artificial intelligence will inevitably be used to make all cars, even low-volume models like its own – and it's already using the technology.
content:
The use of artificial intelligence (AI) in building cars is inevitable, according to Lamborghini, even among smaller specialised automakers – like the Italian exotic brand – that still hand-make some components.
AI is widely used for infotainment and... [2511 chars]

title: TVA: What is the impact of using Artificial Intelligence in job interviews and recruitment in Australia?
description: The use of artificial intelligence, or AI, in recruitment continues to rise, with an estimated two-thirds of organisations in Australia now incorporating the technology into their hiring processes.

title: TSMC Shares Jump Most Since April After Goldman Lifts Target 35%
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. shares climbed by the most since April, as the world’s largest contract chipmaker rides a continued wave of optimism over artificial intelligence demand into the new year.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. shares climbed by the most since April, as the world’s largest contract chipmaker rides a continued wave of optimism over artificial intelligence demand into the new year.

title: TSMC shares jump after Goldman Sachs raises target; stock price rises most since April
description: As the largest contract chipmaker in the world continues to ride a wave of confidence over artificial intelligence demand into the new year, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.'s shares rose by the most since April.

title: AI threatens the future of private messaging, experts warn
description: Experts warn that integrating artificial intelligence (AI) at the operating system level could bypass encryption on messaging apps, putting sensitive user data at risk. Session executives highlighted how user data can be collected, stored and misused for advertising, behavioral manipulation or phishing attacks. Laws like the EU’s Chat Control (Digital Services Act) mandate message scanning […]
content:
